title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.60 - Miscellaneous materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.60 - Miscellaneous materials

State Regulations

The following materials are restricted to a maximum
quantity per vehicle of 10 pounds gross weight, when shipped dry and in
quantity not exceeding four ounces in one outside package for medical purposes
or as reagents (drugs, medicines or chemicals) and when in securely closed
bottles or jars properly cushioned to prevent leakage: (a) Ammonium picrate
(b) Dipicrylamine
(c) Dipicryl sulfide
(d) Dinitrophenylhydrazine
(e) Nitroguanidine
(f) Picramide
(g) Picric acid
(h) Picryl chloride
(i) Trinitroanisole
(j) Trinitrobenzene
(k) Trinitrobenzoic acid
(l) Trinitro-m-cresol
(m) Trinitronaphthalene
(n) Trinitroresorcinol
(o) Trinitrotoluene
(p) Urea nitrate

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.60

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
